name: The Cats of Ulthar
description:
The Cats of Ulthar is based on a short story written by American fantasy author H. P. Lovecraft. In the tale, an unnamed narrator relates the story of how a law forbidding the killing of cats came to be in a town called Ulthar.

Minimum system requirements:
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 
CPU: Intel Core i3-2130 or equivalent
Memory:  8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB

Recommended system requirements:
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 
CPU: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon RX 580
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 1 GB

Follow The Cats of Ulthar
